A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Between the awkward attempts at humour and meandering B plots that split up all of the main characters\, this movie was simultaneously cringe inducing and boring.\nThe A plot was literally the opening scene of 'A New Hope' drawn out to last for 2 and a half hours.\nThis movie somehow managed to make me like the newly introduced characters less\, and also the original trilogy characters as well. The first Star Wars film that I just haven't been able to sit through since my initial cinema viewings. It didn't really leave them with anywhere to go. I feel bad for JJ having to pick up the pieces and resolve the story\, and also feel bad for George Lucas for being betrayed by Disney.
